title: can't change the server.
body:
Hey guys

can anyone tell me why i can't change my account's server ?? it doesn't even show in the store .. 

i'm sure it was there in the store for around 1900 rp or something

replies.body: not really, i sent a ticket and I'll wait for someone to respond
Let us know what they respond to your ticket with please :)
No response yet :) idk what is happening :(

There is a notification on EUW saying 

We're aware that some players have not yet received their end of season rewards and are working on the issue. We will update messaging once we have finished distribution.
 
i am guessing since the distribution isnt done in some servers yet , then you cant move since the reason you werent able to swap servers to begin with was the season rewards ... also there is another notification saying 
11/13/2017
Network Operations â€”

Weâ€™re now rolling out all Ranked and Honor rewards for the 2017 season. Thereâ€™s a lot to do, so we should be wrapped up by December 7. 

hope is not the case
I hope too my friend, I hope too :) Thank you for the information
[Here is the answer](https://s33.postimg.org/jcfubakq7/Screenshot_24.png)
December 7th, so ridiculous waiting forever to switch servers then the time comes around and they delay it for another 2 and half weeks... get your shit together rito
I hope it wont take so long...
Me too ðŸ˜¢ðŸ˜­

Network Operations â€“ 40 minutes ago

Weâ€™ve wrapped up all Ranked and Honor reward grants for the 2017 season. If you havenâ€™t gotten everything you earned, hit us up at support.riotgames.com!

still not open for me tho but hey thats good ?! right?! also the December 7 message is gone
Hi is it posible to move my acc from EUne to EU west? please anyone can help me? before it  was in game so you can do it easly but is not there or i cant find it. Thank you

Nothing yet? I'm an NA player and my main is on EUNE cause I was playing with a new friend but they stopped playing and I've been stuck here for a while... hope they atleast discount them or something cause I bought RP and then found out I couldn't go back to NA. ;_;
whenn rito whenn. qq
Transfers are currently off until November 20th while we ramp up for the end of season.  Sorry about that.  >< Let me know if you have any questions!
i cant transfer yet .. whats going on ?
what time central time will i be able to swap regions??
yea uh im tyring to transfer to euw from eune because i reached the highest lvl of play one eune, how much rp does it cost on november 20th?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2ztaATFg,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-13T21:47:54.990+0000)
>
> Transfers are currently off until November 20th while we ramp up for the end of season.  Sorry about that.  >< Let me know if you have any questions!

any update on this situation? would really like to transfer servers asap.
https://i.imgur.com/jd94KPE.png
Still waiting for trasnfers to turn on, 3PM here and still nothing
can we pleaaaase change servers now
20 nov , still can't change the server . Riot pls
same... 20th november now and STILL can`t change it :(   i guess the thing will be available tonight... so like this is the last day of it being disabled, and tomorrow on 21st we`ll be able to

4 fukin months .. 

it better not cost rp riot .. it better not ;_;
lol it's the fricking new year now.what's wrong with frigging riot.
It looks like server transfers are turned [off ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown)until Nov 20th
man its january 2018 and still nothing RIOT PLEASE
its 30 decmber and i couldnt change comon -_-
Still waiting for Account change, Does anyone know what time it'll be available????
Yea later into the day of November 20th and still no region transfer available....
lol I waited 4 months and I still can't change servers, it's Fuccing January 17
I am waiting since 2 months.When can i transfer my account?
It's December 7th already and I'm still not able to change my server, can anyone else change servers?
i have this problem too.. i wanna change my server but i coudnt.
Can you open it for a few days for those of us who have been waiting the past month and will have to for the next 20 days? seems a bit crazy that we cant change regions for to months straight

Oh god no .. i just purchased 2800 rp on my NA account .. wanted to transfer it to EU ;_; 

Riot please
hi rioters o/ I waited 4 months and played about 50 games on 200ms. It felt bad, guess which lane is my favorite to int :3? wrong, bot is better because I int for the value of 3.
